about_the_game:
Horror and Domination! The Ultimate First-Person Beauties attacking Horror Game in 3D



On the outskirts of town, there stands an old mansion.

Night and day, women lure men into this place for their "banquet of madness."

Once someone steps inside, they never return.

The protagonist eagerly heads to the mansion with a "free dinner ticket with a girl" that arrived at his home.

Resist the women who attack with "powerful magic," and use your wits to escape the mansion!

Main Controls

"Run"
Run in cardinal directions with WASD (↑←↓→) and change your front direction with the mouse. The women will stop chasing after a certain period, so keep running at first.


"Crouch"
Hold the SHIFT key to crouch. This will narrow the detection range of the enemies and also recover damage. Crouch and hide in the shadows. Turn off your flashlight as it will be detected!


"Hide"
You can hide in closets inside the dungeon (long press left-click in front of them). Use the spray that makes your body invisible effectively.


"Throw"
Focus the center dot in the center on the screen and left-click to pick up objects like jars and throw them at the women to stun them. Throwing special chemicals can dissolve their clothes. Use the sound to your strategic advantage, as women will react to it. When solving puzzles, you need to throw from a suitable distance.


When Pushed Down
Mash the "W (↑)" button to break free! If you accumulate a certain amount of damage, it's game over.


After a game over, pressing "CountDown = C key" will start an ejaculation countdown, and pressing "VoicePlay = V key" will make the girl start talking dirty to you.

When in first-person view, you can zoom in and out with the mouse scroll.

Bonus Stage After Clearing All Stages

After clearing the game, you can select stages and girls to freely get attacked (?).



You can also summon multiple girls in one stage.

Additionally, you can generate unlimited chemicals to dissolve the girls' clothes.

Examples of Sexual Techniques (No Reversal)

Along with relentless verbal abuse, you may be suffocated by facesitting and urination.


Sometimes, the girls will spit on you. If you break free from them in this state, you'll run around with spit on your face.


A thorough and degrading electric massage... your private parts might be ruined by the pain and pleasure...


Of course, there's also the classic cowgirl position! If you want your last ejaculation to be regret-free, this is the position?


Main Characters

"The Three Sisters"
Created by "Doctor (deceased)" using scientific power. The three sisters, having seen the Doctor's lonely life, believe there is only pain in this world and feel it is their mission to increase sexual pleasure through fear and pain, leading to a peaceful death (rescue from this world through pleasurable death). They are composed of Nao (red hair), the symbol of youth, Suel (black hair), the symbol of maternity, and Vivi (purple hair), the symbol of intellect.


"Lamia"
A ghostly entity infinitely produced by Venus. She can pass through walls and even possess humans. Dutiful to Venus, she enjoys looking down on men and sending them to heaven as objects. Known as a lustful ghost. She plays an important role in spreading the faith of pleasurable death to society in the future.


"Venus"
Her background is shrouded in mystery. Along with using powerful magic, she leads the three sisters with overwhelming charisma, firmly believing in attracting and sending men to pleasurable deaths. She calls the targets of pleasurable death "Messians," viewing them as sacred beings freed from a world full of pain. The Doctor, originally the director of the lab, became captivated by Venus, the absolute being he tried to create, and devoted himself to completing Venus.


"Protagonist (Player)"
Having led an ordinary life, he narrowly escaped an attack by the three sisters in the previous game. He was originally a sprinter and now a shot-putter for living.

* All characters in this game are fictional and 20+ age.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Description

This game contains mature content that may not be suitable for all audiences, including graphic depictions of sexual acts and light violence. Potential players should be aware that the game explores mature themes and situations, such as:

Explicit sexual content and nudity.
Scenes depicting light violence and gore.
References to sexual assault/non-consensual sex, which are handled with the intent to not glorify such acts.
Elements of BDSM.
We aim to handle these themes with sensitivity and care, but we understand that some players may find this content distressing or offensive. Please consider your comfort level with such material before purchasing or playing.

short_description: [New Genre of Horror × Erotica: Escape from the Mad Women!]You stop by a mansion to be invited for a free dinner. Once inside, you are taken by magic somewhere dark. If caught, you will be beaten, ××, and forced to submit. Solve the mysteries and escape the mansion.
